name: Yukuhito no Pleroma
storyline:
As humans, space, and god meet their end, those who pass reach paradise.
The first world and the last world of Gnostic mythology.
Space has already converged, this is the outer world, where humans return, a filled paradise.
Its name is Pleroma.
A world created by 30 aions.

A story illustrating humans creating paradise and gaining independence from gods, based off Gnostic mythology.
summary:
A visual, sound, and novel game that illustrates a Gnostic world.
A story that combines human history, religion, politics, fiction, and prophecies.
